text.__SUMMARY__: Russula crassotunicata is a North American fungus in the mushroom genus Russula, described by Rolf Singer in 1938 from a collection made in Washington state, USA.It has been confirmed as a host of the parasitic fungus Dendrocollybia racemosa.
